name: Slayer (itch) (TulaibAhmed)
description:
Controls:

Move Left - Left Arrow key

Move Right - Right Arrow key

Jump - Spacebar

Magic Spell - Mouse left click

Description:

In Slayer, you play as a warrior woman with magical powers. Your goal is to slay the monsters that are trying to destroy the kingdom of Tolopia, her home. The goal of the game is to defeat the dragon that is spawning all the monsters.

The art used in the game is original art crafted by my partner Haomiao Wang. We use Beautiful Village from David Fesliyan as our background music for all three stages of the game. 

Artist: Haomiao Wang.

Programmer: Tulaib Ahmed
